filters.word_limit_aria: Maximum number of terms in the cloud
filters.empty_state_select_prompt: Select a centre and, optionally, a programme using the selectors on the left.

methodology.systems_summary: Classification systems are not equivalent: they differ in sensitivity, specificity, and false-positive risk.
methodology.false_positives_note: Systematic cross-system comparisons are still limited; interpret results with caution.
methodology.sections_summary: The analyzed section (competences, course information, references, union/intersection) directly affects detected terms and SDGs.

system_explanations.sys:any: An SDG is accepted if it appears in any system (union rule).
system_explanations.sys:all: An SDG is accepted only if it appears in all systems (intersection rule).
system_explanations.sys:auckland: Auckland system based on Boolean (Lucene-style) queries.
system_explanations.sys:aurora: Aurora Universities Network system based on Boolean (Lucene-style) queries.
system_explanations.sys:elsevier: Elsevier system based on Boolean (Lucene-style) queries.
system_explanations.sys:ensemble_equal: text2sdg ensemble model (random forest) combining six systems and text length, trained with balanced expert and synthetic data.
system_explanations.sys:ensemble_third: text2sdg ensemble model (random forest) trained with an intermediate proportion of synthetic data.
system_explanations.sys:ensemble_triple: text2sdg ensemble model (random forest) trained with higher synthetic-data weight.
system_explanations.sys:sdgo: SDGO system primarily based on keyword matching.
system_explanations.sys:sdsn: SDSN system primarily based on keyword matching.
system_explanations.sys:siris: SIRIS Academic system based on Boolean (Lucene-style) queries.
system_explanations.default: This option controls how system detections are combined or selected.

system_quality_notes.sys:any: Maximizes coverage, but is the most prone to false positives.
system_quality_notes.sys:all: Reduces false positives, but increases false-negative risk.
system_quality_notes.sys:ensemble_equal: Usually offers a stable balance; review borderline cases in short or very generic texts.
system_quality_notes.sys:ensemble_third: Provides an intermediate sensitivity/specificity balance depending on model training.
system_quality_notes.sys:ensemble_triple: Tends toward a more conservative reading and may reduce false positives, but can miss real detections in low-context texts.
system_quality_notes.sys:auckland: Less liberal than keyword systems, but depends on query vocabulary and patterns.
system_quality_notes.sys:aurora: Less liberal than keyword systems, but depends on query vocabulary and patterns.
system_quality_notes.sys:elsevier: Less liberal than keyword systems, but depends on query vocabulary and patterns.
system_quality_notes.sys:sdgo: As a keyword-based system, it is more liberal and more sensitive to false positives in generic contexts.
system_quality_notes.sys:sdsn: As a keyword-based system, it is more liberal and more sensitive to false positives in generic contexts.
system_quality_notes.sys:siris: Less liberal than keyword systems, but depends on query vocabulary and patterns.
system_quality_notes.default: Systematic cross-system validations are still limited; interpret outputs with caution.

section_explanations.sec:any: competences, course information, and references are combined (union).
section_explanations.sec:all: only terms present across all sections are kept (intersection).
section_explanations.sec:competences: only competences and outcomes are analyzed; highly cross-cutting terms may repeat often.
section_explanations.sec:course_info: only title, description, and syllabus content are analyzed; this is closest to what is taught in the course.
section_explanations.sec:references: only bibliography and references are analyzed; this can introduce contextual terms that are not central to course delivery.
section_explanations.default: the selected section criterion is applied to the course guide.

ods_guidance.summary: In doughnut and bar charts, values represent relative presence of SDGs detected in filtered text, not a qualitative assessment of teaching quality.
ods_guidance.coverage_caution: Changing system or section can alter percentages due to sensitivity and textual-context differences.
